umbala minissu mulakarala 2014 di mahinda wa gedera ariya eke prathipala as panapitama penenawa neda. Habai sinhalayan dan avurudu 04 k kapu parippu kawadawath unge hithwalin ath karanna be.  gotatata , mahidata ayeth mada gahanna patan aran unge heluwa wahaganna. namuth UNP un matahaka thiyaganilla umbala 30 avurudu uddaya arabala karapu wipaketa dan avurudu 20 kin janapathiyek pathune ne. me kala papeta me lokaya thiyna thuru umbala ayeth rajya balaya ho janapathiyek labenne ne.  me avurudu 05 thamai umbalage awasana rajya kalaya. E bawa mathaka thiyaganilla.
